:show.description: Whether or not to display the keyboard

theme.description_zh: 样式风格，可选值为 custom

maxlength.description: Enter the maximum length of the value

transition.description: Whether to turn on the cutscene

extra-key.description: The contents of the extra keys at the bottom

close-button-text.description: Turn off the button text, and if it's empty, it won't be displayed
close-button-text.description_zh: 关闭按钮文字，空则不展示

delete-button-text.description: Delete the button text, and display the delete icon if it is empty
delete-button-text.description_zh: 删除按钮文字，空则展示删除图标

close-button-loading.description: Whether to set the close button to the loading state only works when 'theme="custom"'
close-button-loading.description_zh: 是否将关闭按钮设置为加载中状态，仅在 `theme="custom"` 时有效

show-delete-key.description: Whether to display the delete icon

blur-on-close.description: Whether or not to trigger the blur event when the close button is clicked
blur-on-close.description_zh: 是否在点击关闭按钮时触发 blur 事件

hide-on-click-outside.description: Whether to collapse the keyboard when clicking on the outside
hide-on-click-outside.description_zh: 是否在点击外部时收起键盘

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

random-key-order.description: Whether the keys will be displayed in a random order
random-key-order.description_zh: 是否将通过随机顺序展示按键

events.name: input
events.description: Triggered when a button is clicked

events.name: delete
events.description: Triggered when the delete key is clicked

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the close button is clicked

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the close button or non-keyboard area is tapped
events.description_zh: 点击关闭按钮或非键盘区域时触发

events.name: show
events.description: Triggers when the keyboard pops out completely

events.name: hide
events.description: Triggers when the keyboard is fully retracted

slots.name: delete
slots.description: Customize the content of the deleted button

slots.name: extra-key
slots.description: Customize the content of the button in the lower left corner
slots.description_zh: 自定义左下角按键内容

slots.name: title-left
slots.description: Customize the content on the left side of the title bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义标题栏左侧内容
